name: Silas A'Court
notes: Charles Edward A'Court.  Birth Certificate Bedminster, counties of Bristol and Somerset.  When & where, 14 April 1860, Back Lane

Fromthe 1871  for St Mary Redcliff/Bristol I see that Silas and Ann  had a daughter Mary and three sons, Albert, William and my grandfather, Charles Edward.  I have no information beyond that.  Thanks for any help.  Betty Jones  Solana Beach, Cali
